definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 樹木還能保持水分防止土壤侵蝕。

sentences.english: Because different worms live in different strata, or portions of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 不同的蚯蚓居住在不同的土壤層。

sentences.english: With more forests being destoryed, huge quantities of good earth are washed away each year.
sentences.chinese: 由於更多森林被破壞，每年有大量的好土壤流失掉了。

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 這片土壤太貧瘠了，想整個兒施一通肥。

sentences.english: The percentage of soil moisture content and surface residual coverage jointly influence the quantity of wind erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水率和地表殘茬覆蓋共同影響着土壤的風蝕量。

sentences.english: The percentage of soil moisture content and surface residual coverage jointly influence the quantity of wind erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水率和地表殘茬覆蓋共同影響着土壤的風蝕量。

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計一套基於靜電收集法的雙道瞬時土壤測氡儀。

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤養分的結構性變異大於隨機變異。

sentences.english: This article mainly illustrated the application of soil erosion estimation method based on Geographic Information System (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤侵蝕定量遙感方法在浙江省仙居縣的應用。

sentences.english: Bachu mushroom has more adapt to soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 巴楚蘑菇對土壤營養條件有很強的適應性。

sentences.english: These substances leak from the rusty barrels and pollute soil.
sentences.chinese: 這些物質從生鏽的桶中滲出然後污染了土壤。

sentences.english: Roses will not root in such acid soil.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰在這種酸性土壤中不會生根。

sentences.english: The behavior of good soil field holding capacity on the tableland area is the superior advantage of ecological conditions for this region.
sentences.chinese: 臺原土壤優良持水特性是黃土旱源優勢的生態條件。

sentences.english: The soil sample came from a trench approximately 2 inches deep.
sentences.chinese: 土壤標本來自於一個大概2寸深的溝渠。

sentences.english: The content of different form nitrogen in vegetable field is higher than wood soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中各種形態氮的含量菜地上壤高於林地土壤。

sentences.english: The content of different form nitrogen in vegetable field is higher than wood soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中各種形態氮的含量菜地上壤高於林地土壤。
